## Questions on SAS-Code and our implementation

+ Risk in SAS-Code is calculated for each region hierarchy-level and **risk variable** seperately
+ Variable-specific risks are then averaged for each hierarchy and if this risk exceeds a specific (user defined?) thershold the household gets a flag for high risk and will be swapped
+ Swap-Rate is applied at highest level and distributed among lower levels taking into account the number of high risk households in each level
